heading: Antre nan Misyon Nou
intro: Men kijan ou ka ede retabli diyite epi rebati espwa.

steps.step1: Enskri pou resevwa bilten nou an.
steps.step2: Pataje vizyon nou ak kominote w la.
steps.step3: Bay tan w, konpetans w, oswa resous w.

callToAction: Ansanm, nou ka fè diferans lan.
successMessage: Mèsi paske ou te rantre! N'ap kontakte w talè.
errorMessage: Oups! Gen yon erè ki fèt. Tanpri eseye ankò.
